description: After Kyouta`s career plan interview at school Yoriko tries to talk with him but Misato arrives to pick up the boy for a live performance of Ryuusei and Morino Kanae; disappointed, the girl refuses to tag along. At this gig Kyouta witnesses a supernatural power struggle between Misato and Kanae`s manager Abuto. Yoriko suggests Kyouta they shouldn`t see each other any more; Kyouta then initiates T.L.System to perform a live gig just for Yoriko but when they begin to play lots of female fans appear out of nowhere.
